metadata.Title: CVE-2016-10204 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Compliant (xenial) - medium.
metadata.Description: SQL injection vulnerability in Zoneminder 1.30 and earlier allows remote attackers to execute arbitrary SQL commands via the limit parameter in a log query request to index.php.

criterions.comment: zoneminder: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needed').
